product_name: AquaphorNaturally Inspired Lip Repair Lip Balm Stick with Shea Butter
summary: SummaryAquaphor Naturally Inspired Lip Repair Lip Balm Stick with Shea Butter immediately relieves dryness and soothes chapped lips, leaving lips feeling soft and hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsProven to relieve dryness and soothe chapped lipsGlides on easily for a smooth applicationHelps lips look and feel healthierLip balm tube slips conveniently into your pocket or bag for on-the-go useKey IngredientsFormulated with 99% naturally derived ingredients**Naturally derived ingredients including purified water, have undergone processing while maintaining a majority of their molecular structure. Skin safe synthetics are included to maintain the integrity of the product.With nourishing vitamins and Natural Shea ButterFormulated WithoutFragrancePreservativesDyesItem 2636728How To UseApply Aquaphor Naturally Inspired Lip Repair Stick liberally to dry or chapped lips as often as needed. The lip balm glides on easily and is great for use in dry, cold or windy conditions.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children. Stop use if irritation develops.IngredientsOctyldodecanol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Beeswax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Water. Synthetics: Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Apply Aquaphor Naturally Inspired Lip Repair Stick liberally to dry or chapped lips as often as needed. The lip balm glides on easily and is great for use in dry, cold or windy conditions.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children. Stop use if irritation develops.

reviews.headline: Zero is the true rating
reviews.comments: Do not waste your money, this is not hydrating. It sits on top of your lips and does nothing. Find something else.

reviews.headline: Helps My Dry Lips
reviews.comments: My lips tend to be dry, and this really helps hydrate them. I feel like I have to apply a lot, but I don't mind. I like the stick versus applying it with my fingers. There is no taste and it is not sticky. It provides a good base for lip color, and it helps repair dryness at night.

reviews.headline: my fav
reviews.comments: this is the best for dry lips!

reviews.headline: Do not buy!!
reviews.comments: This stuff dried my lips out like crazy. And caused them to peel. Buy the original its way better this one sucks

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: I had really chapped lips before I got this: I tried different t brands like eos and they just wouldn't work. Finally I got aquaphor and within a day my lips were like a normal person. The only thing is O have to reapply it at least twice a day or else my lips burn.

reviews.headline: My Dr suggested Aquaphor
reviews.comments: Menopause has a way of drying out every part of your body, lips no exception.  My GYN suggested I try Aquaphor when I mentioned my dry, cracking, winter ravaged lips.  I had been using Blistex and it wasn't healing them. Aquaphor healed them within a couple days. I did use the product several times a day. They now feel soft and healthy, no longer dry or cracking. I use it under lipstick and it creates a nice base. I'll continue to buy it and recommend it.

reviews.headline: I love this for CHAPPED  lips
reviews.comments: I bought 13 of these Aquaphor chapped sticks/ gel style for our group going to cabins and hot springs for a getaway.  Everyone forgot their own chapped sticks.  They were happily surprised plus they were Aquaphor!!

reviews.headline: Sucks
reviews.comments: Dried lips out

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Within a few days my lips felt better and smoother

reviews.headline: This feels like a scam
reviews.comments: I swear nothing comes off of this stick

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: I love this product! this is a refill of my old one and the formula is amazing. locks in moisture and keeps my lips unchapped.

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: I love this product! this is a refill of my old one and the formula is amazing. locks in moisture and keeps my lips unchapped.

reviews.headline: For the worst chapped lips.
reviews.comments: This is the best! My lips have never felt so good.

reviews.headline: Surprised it's not rated better.
reviews.comments: When i had severely dried out and chapped lips, NOTHING else was helping. I had nonidea what to do. I grabbed the tube version on a whim and while i found it very moisturizing, the taste was really bad. This stick doesnt. And just as moisturizing. This torally repaired my lips. I tried tons of other products for weeks that were not helping and within a few days this helped.

reviews.headline: Too dry
reviews.comments: Too dry, not hydrating. It does not go on smoothly.

reviews.headline: Favorite balm
reviews.comments: I love this balm, found it here and got it, works good for dry lips, no bad taste or smell, is one of my favorites now

reviews.headline: Great for lips and eyelashes!ðŸ‘€ðŸ‘„
reviews.comments:
I love this product so much because it moisturizes my lips and makes my eye lashes look great! 
About the eyelashes,
I use this stick after my eyelash curler to make my lashes stay and look great! I put just a little on my lashes and it look awesome and stays for a while. 
About the lips, 
This product makes my lips feel hydrated and great! I also have braces which makes my lips feel dry sometimes so when i put on this lip stick it makes me and my lips feel better! 
Totally reccomend this product to anyone!

reviews.headline: literally the worst
reviews.comments: I've been using the regular Aquaphor for years, and hoped this would be a more portable version. It actually dries out my lips more.

reviews.headline: Does not last!
reviews.comments: This lip moisturizer goes on smooth, but does not last on the lips; 30 minutes later lips are dry and feels like I never applied anything.

reviews.headline: dont buy it trust me
reviews.comments: do not buy this its not good it dont hydrate and it doesnt soak in instead buy the squeezy lip balm thats better but this is horrible i had high expectations for this just for my hopes to be crushed i am dissapointed

media.headline: Ehâ€¦Not like the one in the bigger tube

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm down to the last centimeter or so of mine, so Ulta decided to start carrying this at the perfect time! It might be a couple bucks cheaper at the drugstore, but I'm happy to be able to support Ulta and earn points for buying it through them. Also, it's always good to have a little something to throw in with your order if the value of your other products isn't quite enough for free shipping. Personally, I can't use Aquaphor's Lip Repair in the little tube because it has almost all the same ingredients â€”but with chamomile essence added. (TIP for fellow allergy sufferers: if you have a common ragweed allergy, stay away from anything in the daisy/calendula/chamomile/echinacea family because those plants are all in the same family as ragweed!!!) 

Anyways, this lip balm is my go-to for simple, non-fragranced, non-irritating lip protection and nourishment. I apply it at the end of my skincare routine after washing my face or showering before bed. If I need a little extra oomph I layer CeraVe's Healing Ointment over top to extend the wear and lock in the moisture. Scented/flavored lip balms can be fun for a midday pick-me-up, but at bedtime I want to make sure that the lip balm I'm using has minimal, effective, gentle ingredients so that if it smears around my face or on my pillow while I'm sleeping it won't be a problem. This does the job! I only give it 4 stars because even if I love a product, I don't give it 5 stars unless there's something really innovative or mind blowing about it. But don't get me wrong, this is a wonderful product for what it is and for the price point it's offered at. (Also I've noticed a lot of 5 star reviews on Ulta seem to be fake like they were made by the company or bots or something? So it's also my attempt to prove this is my genuine opinion, lol.)
faceoff_positive.headline: Staple in my routine

faceoff_negative.comments: I have severe eczema on basically every inch of my skin and this lip balm did nothing. I put it on and 10 minutes later my lips still feel as dry as it did before putting on the chapstick. not to mention after a while a white ring formed around my mouth and just sayin I got a lot of stares from my neighbors when I went outside. My eczema is really bad, the skin on my lips will peel up, form blisters, bruise, and bleed if they aren't hydrated. if you have severe eczema like I do, this isn't for you. would give 0 stars if I could
faceoff_negative.headline: not for eczema lips
